levels.name: Turrets
levels.description: Place automated turrets that find and shoot at nearby zombies. Turret is destroyed once its limited ammo capacity is depleted.

levels.name: Bigger Inventory
levels.description: Carry twice as many turrets in your inventory as before.

levels.name: Ammo Capacity
levels.description: Turrets now start with double the ammo.

levels.name: Damage Boost
levels.description: Turrets now do double the damage.

levels.name: Better Cooling
levels.description: Improves cooling on turrets so they overheat less often.
